courseName: Artificial Intelligence with Speech and Multimodal Interaction - MSc/PGDip
facultyName: School of Mathematical and Computer Sciences
description: If you have ever wondered how to build an AI system like Siri or Cortana which can understand human language and carry out conversations with people, or how to build an interactive robot that can speak with humans, then this programme will provide all the knowledge and skills you need.
duration: 9-12 months full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
